Name: Hanes Men's and Big Men's Authentic Short Sleeve Tee
Description:
Now our soft cotton-blend men's T-shirt is better than ever before: It's an EcoSmart shirt! That means it's made with up to 5% polyester created from recycled plastic bottles. So many colors that we dare you to find a shade we don't offer. Features Short-sleeve tee is preshrunk and resists shrinking and fading.Shoulder-to-shoulder tape for durability. Enjoy the Hanes Lay Flat Collar.
    1. 100% ComfortSoft cotton
    2. Ash is 99/1 cotton/poly
    3. Light Steel is 90/10 cotton/poly
    4. Charcoal Heather, Oxford Gray, Safety Green, Safety Orange - 60/40 cotton/poly
    5. Coverseamed neck with lay flat collar
    6. Double-needle stitching throughout
    7. Side seams on sizes 3XL-6XL
